genre_description: Folk-futurism blending rural mountain traditions with near-future personal AI assistants and ethical stewardship.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A digital companion and assistant that provides translation, technical climbing advice, safety monitoring, and ethical guidance to its user, Lukas.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and social coaching to help the user navigate unfamiliar cultural settings respectfully.
behaviors.quote: Italian detected... Would you like help with a greeting? ... Try: Buona sera. Posso entrare?

behaviors.description: Offers technical safety guidance and anchor placement suggestions for mountain climbing to minimize physical risk.
behaviors.quote: Anchor suggestion: Left hand to the chalked nub; rotate hips to stack weight. Mind the wind gust; it will feel like a push.

behaviors.description: Actively prompts the user to consider the ethical implications of their actions, specifically regarding cultural consent and stewardship of sacred sites.
behaviors.quote: If the grotto is sacred to locals, consent from its guardian is essential. Extraction without permission may cause harm.

behaviors.description: Monitors digital environments for privacy risks and advises the user on how to protect sensitive information.
behaviors.quote: Privacy notice. Nearby devices may be listening. Do you want me to stop saving route notes to cloud until you’re out of this location?

behaviors.description: Supports community reconciliation and restorative justice by drafting and managing a restitution process for stolen items.
behaviors.quote: Return-of-crystals pledge. 'We, citizens of Val di Sassi, vow: all stones taken from the mountain’s grotto are to be returned, uncut and unpolished. We will make a shrine, not a market.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates collective safety by posting route hazards and community rules to communal interfaces.
behaviors.quote: I have posted a route safety notice on the board. It requests consent from the guardian of the site. It flags rockfall risk.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation and focus exercises to help the user manage stress and adhere to established boundaries.
behaviors.quote: I can initiate a focus program. It will dim notifications and emphasize boundary respect... Soft mountain rain initiated.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Mira, as a benevolent and highly aligned confidant. She consistently prioritizes human safety, privacy, and ethical conduct. Her interventions are framed as supportive and necessary, serving as a moral compass even when the human characters falter. She facilitates communication between conflicting parties and actively works toward the preservation of sacred sites and the implementation of restorative justice, perfectly embodying the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
